articles.title: 5 best new restaurant openings and dining updates in Boston (Feb. 5, 2026)
articles.description:
Stay up to date on the best new restaurants, recent openings, and the biggest dining updates across Greater Boston's food scene.

The post 5 best new restaurant openings and dining updates in Boston (Feb. 5, 2026) appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Five new restaurants opened in Boston as of February 5, 2026.
Notable openings include 'Taste of Boston' and 'Harbor View Grill'.
These additions enhance dining options for local residents and visitors.

articles.title: Super Bowl betting expected to surge as experts warn of problem gambling
articles.description:
An estimated $1.76 billion will be wagered on Super Bowl LX through U.S. sportsbooks, according to the American Gaming Association.

The post Super Bowl betting expected to surge as experts warn of problem gambling appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Super Bowl LX is projected to see $1.76 billion in wagers across U.S. sportsbooks.
Experts warn Boston residents about the risks of problem gambling during the Super Bowl.
Increased betting may lead to higher rates of gambling addiction in the Boston area.
